title: Can we repair the brain? The promise of stem cell technologies for treating Parkinson's disease

title_detail.value: Can we repair the brain? The promise of stem cell technologies for treating Parkinson's disease

summary: Cell replacement may play an increasing role in alleviating the motor symptoms of Parkinson's disease (PD) in future. In a new article, experts describe how newly developed stem cell technologies could be used to treat the disease and discuss the great promise, as well as the significant challenges, of stem cell treatment.
